title: Internet is fine but cannot connect to League of Legends

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: After starting the game, I would periodically get a 1-2 minute 500 ping spike, where the "Attempt to Reconnect" message appears. I tried to leave and relog into the game, but I wasn't able to and I'm stuck here even though my internet is fine. Edit: I tried exitting the League of Legends client, and now I can't even log back on -- I'm getting the connection error message everytime.

replies.body: same problem it's really annoying I've been trying to connect all day even tho my internet is working fine.
Riot employees, please answer us, we have these problems with no way to report them and then we get penalized because we had no options in these matters.
IS HAPPEN TO ME NOW!!!
I AM HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM I NOW ITS OLD BUT ANY HELP???
Same issue.  Internet's fine, making this post and watching a livestream, but can't connect to League servers.  Not even chat.  And I was in the middle of a ranked game when this all happened.
Is this still ongoing? What region are you located in please and did you try making contact with Cox regarding this issue?

I just got that problem (or something similar). I was in rank game, pings were fine at first. But I suddenly got hit with that "attempting to reconnect". I disconnect to reconnect because its not working. My first attempt to reconnect ends with a white screen. I force quit that game and then the league just runs like I wasn't in that game. So my friend is still in that game, but I cannot reconnect to that game and I can play (the option was there) another, be it rank or normal. I quit the app, and try to log back in but the game just would not start.
Is your ISP Cox? Then you are having this issue.

The issue is still with Riot.  It lies solely with their servers' ability to receive connections from that ISP.  Everything else is working fine for Cox customers, it's JUST Riot's servers that they can't connect to.
same
This just happened to me too.

I just got that problem (or something similar). I was in rank game, pings were fine at first. But I suddenly got hit with that "attempting to reconnect". I disconnect to reconnect because its not working. My first attempt to reconnect ends with a white screen. I force quit that game and then the league just runs like I wasn't in that game. So my friend is still in that game, but I cannot reconnect to that game and I can play (the option was there) another, be it rank or normal. I quit the app, and try to log back in but the game just would not start.

Just happened to me. Game running smooth as usual then suddenly huge lag spike, game becomes completely unplayable. After a couple minutes of chilling in the fountain hoping it would go away, i decided to close game and now can't even login......

Assuming that match will be a loss...

NA server occured at approx 12:15 Pacific time
Still can't get in 12:30
Just got that today..... its happening right now XD
I'm having this issue now too! I posted about it and got no response! I can't play league and the game is blaming me for it!
Literally just happened to me and I lost a ranked game because of it.

I am in the EUW region. After finishing champion select my screen goes dark to load the loading page like it usually does. But instead of loading me with the other people it just prevents me from connecting. I tried to close the league client and re login, but after that it opens two game pages and none of them work. I lost my promos for free. Btw my internet works perfectly fine because to test it I opened youtube on my phone and on my computer then quickly closed them again.
Yo man, exactly the same problem. You know how to fix it?
Same problem. Everything else is fine...
i'm having the same exact problem and i can connect to everything else just fine
Same problem, but I am on Comcast. Ran Smite and WoW fine, but could not get back into League. Also lower priority queue for 5 games...

Yeah same thing just happened with me in a ranked queue, though after about 20 mins of restarting and connecting to the LoL client it just up and decides to magically work. Now im punished for it and put into a lower priority queue after 1 afk match at 20 mins. a pop for 5 games??????   How in the hell does that work?

I'm not on Cox.  I'm on AT&T U-verse.  Having the same issue this morning.  Tried to play a quick AI Bot game for first win of the day bonus.  Got the black screen of perpetual loading instead of the usual loading screen.  It would stay there forever I guess since it would only go away when I alt+f4 out.  Tried logging back on only for it to happen over and over until the match I was "in" ended.  Lost my first win bonus, but decided to try again just to see what would happen.  Same issue of black loading screeen. 

My connection to everything else is fine.  Can go to any site with no problem and log in other online games without issue.  Problem I'm having is LoL exclusive.
